content: @Sebastien Gouezel kindly reviewed this PR #5629 for me and commented that my naming was probably not quite right. He also suggested double checking here on Zulip.
Can someone who is confident of the new naming take a quick look?
I confess I am not yet a convert from Mathlib3 to Mathlib4 naming: this is your opportunity to convert me!
The rule is that if you refer to an UpperCamelCase declaration (e.g. AnalyticOn) in a theorem name, you use lowerCamelCase (e.g. analyticOn), and segments are still separated by underscores
I appreciate the clear explanation though I remain to be converted :wink:
